author: Nathan Thrall
description: The long read: The possibility of a lasting deal seems as far away as ever – and the history of failed negotiations suggests it’s largely because Israel prefers the status quo
title: Israel-Palestine: the real reason there’s still no peace

author: Ori Lewis
description: Israel wants the White House to explain why a U.S. diplomat preparing President Donald Trump's visit to Jerusalem said Judaism's Holy Western Wall in its Old City is part of the Israeli-occupied West Bank, an Israeli official said on Monday.
title: Israel wants White House to explain U.S. official's  Western Wall comment

author: Jay Solomon
description: Arab Gulf states have offered to take concrete steps to establish better relations with Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will make a significant overture aimed at restarting the Middle East peace process, according to people briefed on the discussions.
title: Gulf States Offer Better Relations If Israel Makes New Bid for Peace

author: Jaclynn Ashly
description: A Palestinian elder recounts how the creation of Israel shattered his pastoral village life nearly 70 years ago.
title: Nakba: 'It remains bitter and continues to burn'

author: Al Jazeera
description: Protests and vigils in occupied West Bank, Gaza and Israel as Palestinians mark forced displacement from lands in 1948.
title: Palestinians mark 69th 'Nakba' anniversary with rallies

author: Al Jazeera
description: Hamas says suspects admitted received instructions from Israel for carrying out killing as '45 collaborators' are held.
title: Hamas: Three suspects confess to killing Mazen Faqha
